title: What is Amazon Personalize?

metadata.description: Learn about What is Amazon Personalize? with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Amazon Personalize is a real-time user experience personalization service powered by machine learning algorithms.
Amazon Personalize Introduction Video
.com is collaborating with Amazon Web Services to deliver digital training content to our students
What is Amazon Personalize?
Amazon Personalize is abased on the same technology used by Amazon.com for real-time personalized recommendations.
Management of an Amazon Personalize is automated.
It can be integrated into websites, mobile applications, etc. via an API.
Amazon Personalize Pricing
Amazon Personalize pricing is based on the amount of data stored and processed, the training time and the processed personalization requests.
There are no contracts or minimum charges.

★
+1
